title: How to Eat Toxic Waste Candy

methods.name: Prior to Putting it in Your Mouth

steps.headline: Eat something salty.
steps.description: If you are tasting something salty before you put the candy in your mouth, the sourness of the candy will relieve the salty flavor that you taste.

steps.headline: Numb your tongue.
steps.description: One way to do this is to take an ice cube, and hold it on your tongue for one minute.

methods.name: When It is in Your Mouth

steps.headline: Think about other things that are not related to food.
steps.description: You do not want to be thinking about sourness during the ordeal. Count down the amount of seconds that you need to have it in your mouth.

steps.headline: Meditate.
steps.description: Meditation will take your mind off of the pain, and it will be over before you know it.

steps.headline: Just keep it in your mouth.
steps.description: Do you want your friend to think you can't take pain, or do you just want to get it over with?

methods.name: When You Take it Out of Your Mouth

steps.headline: Drink some milk.
steps.description: Not only does milk get rid of a feeling of spice, it also gets rid of a feeling of sourness.

steps.headline: Eat something spicy.
steps.description: If you want to completely get rid of that annoying flavor, eat something spicy, despite the fact that it may leave your mouth burning while you hope for relief. Please note: If you don't like spicy foods and are afraid that you will burn your mouth, eat little spicy food, or don't eat any at all.
